Burning things in an oven is sometimes too rough to obtain some of the most delicate essences and liquids.
Through the use of tourmaline powder, a witch may focus magical energy into gentle distillation processes
to bottle the purest essences of magic. Up to

six diferent items (regardless of the quantity of said item) can be distilled at once, burning them through the use of the powder from a fiery being of Hell.
However, to tame the powerful magical flames only this powder creates, magic from an altar or witch is required, which different items requiring differents amount of energy.
